title: Noir Mist
description: Une esthétique cinématographique de film noir des années 1940 caractérisée par un éclairage en clair-obscur très contrasté, un brouillard volumétrique dense et un grain de film argentique authentique. Le style met l'accent sur un éclairage en contre-jour dramatique qui sépare le sujet d'un arrière-plan riche en bokeh, créant une atmosphère de mystère et d'élégance intemporelle.
description_en: A cinematic 1940s film noir aesthetic characterized by high-contrast chiaroscuro lighting, heavy volumetric fog, and authentic silver gelatin film grain. The style emphasizes dramatic rim lighting that separates the subject from a moody, bokeh-rich background, creating a sense of mystery and timeless elegance.
description_fr: Une esthétique cinématographique de film noir des années 1940 caractérisée par un éclairage en clair-obscur très contrasté, un brouillard volumétrique dense et un grain de film argentique authentique. Le style met l'accent sur un éclairage en contre-jour dramatique qui sépare le sujet d'un arrière-plan riche en bokeh, créant une atmosphère de mystère et d'élégance intemporelle.
prompt: Authentic 1940s film noir cinematography, silver gelatin monochrome photography, {{subject}} captured in a dramatic mid-shot that fills the frame completely, rendered with the texture of high-ISO 35mm film stock featuring visible grain and organic noise, heavy volumetric fog and atmospheric haze diffusing the light sources, intense rim lighting (kicker light) creating a glowing halo effect on the silhouette while leaving the face in partial shadow (Rembrandt lighting or split lighting), deep crushed blacks and brilliant specular highlights, the palette is a desaturated or monochrome gradient dominated by {{primary_color}} tones in the shadows and {{accent_color}} tints in the highlights, soft focus background with creamy bokeh balls generated by an 85mm f/1.2 lens, halation around bright light sources, skin texture rendered with subsurface scattering but softened by a pro-mist diffusion filter, mood is {{mood}} and mysterious, environment details blur into a cinematic abstraction, distinct separation between foreground subject and background depth, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas, cinematic composition, film noir, chiaroscuro, volumetric lighting, atmospheric haze, vintage photography, photorealistic, dramatic shadows, ray tracing, global illumination, 8k resolution.
prompt_removebg: Authentic 1940s film noir cinematography, silver gelatin monochrome photography, {{subject}} captured in a dramatic mid-shot that fills the frame completely, rendered with the texture of high-ISO 35mm film stock featuring visible grain and organic noise, heavy volumetric fog and atmospheric haze diffusing the light sources, intense rim lighting (kicker light) creating a glowing halo effect on the silhouette while leaving the face in partial shadow (Rembrandt lighting or split lighting), deep crushed blacks and brilliant specular highlights, the palette is a desaturated or monochrome gradient dominated by {{primary_color}} tones in the shadows and {{accent_color}} tints in the highlights, skin texture rendered with subsurface scattering but softened by a pro-mist diffusion filter, mood is {{mood}} and mysterious, subject is isolated and composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface, edges are defined by a sharp rim-light glow that creates distinct separation against the {{background_color}} backdrop, fine details like hair and translucent smoke wisps are preserved and anti-aliased to blend naturally with the {{background_color}}, full bleed, no border, no frame, no canvas, cinematic composition, film noir, chiaroscuro, volumetric lighting, atmospheric haze, vintage photography, photorealistic, dramatic shadows, ray tracing, global illumination, 8k resolution.
background_prompt: A dimly lit, atmospheric interior scene reminiscent of a 1940s jazz bar or speakeasy, captured with heavy film grain and soft focus, background elements include blurred shelves of glass bottles and vague silhouettes of patrons in the distance, strong volumetric lighting creates visible beams (god rays) cutting through thick cigar smoke and haze, circular bokeh highlights from distant lamps, high contrast lighting with deep shadows in {{primary_color}} tones and washed-out highlights in {{accent_color}}, texture of vintage silver gelatin film, cinematic depth of field, no foreground subject, full bleed.
background_prompt_removebg: A dimly lit, atmospheric interior scene reminiscent of a 1940s jazz bar or speakeasy, captured with heavy film grain and soft focus, background elements include blurred shelves of glass bottles and vague silhouettes of patrons in the distance, strong volumetric lighting creates visible beams (god rays) cutting through thick cigar smoke and haze, circular bokeh highlights from distant lamps, high contrast lighting with deep shadows in {{primary_color}} tones and washed-out highlights in {{accent_color}}, texture of vintage silver gelatin film, cinematic depth of field, overlaid with a subtle vintage film vignette or film sprocket border effect in the foreground that frames the empty space, the entire scene gently fades into a flat {{background_color}} surface at the outer edges for seamless compositing, no foreground subject.
